Liono, that last post was crap. It was full of moding, not to mention that to 
get to the brig, you'd have to blow through quite alot of walls, which you 
could not have possibly done with jet power alone.

Hitting Scattershot AND POSTING DAMAGE for him, not to mention grabbing Punch 
and also not letting me reply was extreme moding. Posting for the Autoguns of 
MY base, and just plain doing the whole thing in one post was moding. I 
suggest you rewrite that post, or I'm going to moderate you.
